SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Source loads the TrafficCount fact table. This table is considered for internal use only by the business group. It sources it's data directly from the RecordType8 table in TARIS used for loading the TARIS database. Session is set to truncate and reload each session.
Source: TARIS Target: TDOTrafficDataMart
SESSION.NAME: s_TrafficCount

Email Text
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
Session %s failed.

Total Records Loaded: %l Total Records Rejected: %r
Session Start Time: %b Session Completion Time: %c

SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Sesion loads the ADCYearEndTrafficCount fact table. It is set to truncate and reload each run.
Source: TARIS Target: TDOTrafficDataMart
SESSION.NAME: s_ADCYearEndTrafficCount

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.ADC_Cnt_ID_Cd, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Trfc_Cnt_Leg_Cd, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Yr, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Trfc_Cmps_Dirn_Cd, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.ADC_Avg_Typ_Cd, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.ARM, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.SR_Num, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.RRT_Cd, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.RRQ, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.ADC_Avg_Cnt, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Thirtieth_Peak_Hr_Pct, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Thirtieth_Peak_Hr_Dirnl_Pct, ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt.Thirtieth_Peak_Hr_Trk_Pct FROM ADC_Yr_End_Trfc_Cnt
